sqlMap.select:
select ID,VH_ID,VH_NAME,VH_IP from TB_CLOUD2_VMHOST_INFO
VH_IP =#VH_IP#
domain =#domain#

select a.ID,a.VH_UUID, a.VH_ID,a.VH_NAME,a.VH_MEM,a.VH_CPU,a.VH_STORAGE,a.VH_SYSTEM,a.VH_IP,IFNULL(a.VH_NETWORK, '0') AS VH_NETWORK,a.EQ_ID,a.VH_STAT,a.VH_DESC,a.VH_MIN_CPU, a.VH_MAX_CPU,a.VH_MIN_MEM,a.VH_MAX_MEM,a.VH_LOG,a.VH_USER,a.VH_PASS,a.VH_TYPE, a.VH_CID,a.VH_STATUS,a.VH_UNITID,a.DNS,a.CONNECT_ID connectId,a.HOST_CODE hostCode,a.domain from TB_CLOUD2_VMHOST_INFO a
a.VH_NAME like CONCAT('%',#VH_NAME#,'%')
a.VH_TYPE = #VH_TYPE#
a.VH_TYPE = #VH_TYPE_1#
a.ID = #ID#
a.VH_UUID = #VH_UUID#
a.VH_IP = #VH_IP#
a.CONNECT_ID = #connectId#
a.HOST_CODE in
#hostIdList[]#
a.domain =#domain#
sqlMap.sql:
select a.ID,a.VH_UUID, a.VH_ID,a.VH_NAME,a.VH_MEM,a.VH_CPU,a.VH_STORAGE,a.VH_SYSTEM,IFNULL(a.VH_IP,'-') AS VH_IP,IFNULL(a.VH_NETWORK, '0') AS VH_NETWORK,a.EQ_ID,a.VH_STAT,a.VH_DESC,a.VH_MIN_CPU, a.VH_MAX_CPU,a.VH_MIN_MEM,a.VH_MAX_MEM,a.VH_LOG,a.VH_USER,a.VH_PASS,a.BUSI_STATUS,CASE when a.vh_type='1' THEN 'VMWARE' WHEN a.vh_type ='3' THEN 'XEN' END AS VH_TYPE, a.VH_CID,a.VH_STATUS,a.VH_UNITID,a.DNS,a.CONNECT_ID as connectId, count(e.IP) as APPNUM, e.ID as H_ID,h.EQ_NAME as EQ_NAME,a.domain from TB_CLOUD2_VMHOST_INFO a left join (select b.IP, b.ID from TB_BUSI_DEPLOY_EXAMPLE g, TB_BUSI_HOST b, TB_SYS_APP d, TB_CLOUD2_BIZSYS_INFO e, TB_BUSI_HOST_CONFIG f WHERE g.HOSTID = b.ID AND g.APPID = d.ID AND g.SYS_ID = e.SYS_ID AND g.HOST_CONFIG_ID = f.HOSTCONFIGID) e ON a.VH_IP =e.IP LEFT JOIN TB_CLOUD2_HOST_INFO h on a.eq_id = h.eq_id
EXISTS (select 1 from tb_host_global_info tt where tt.center_uuid = #centerid# and h.CONNECT_ID = tt.connect_uuid and tt.host_uuid = h.H_uuid)
a.VH_TYPE in ('1','3')
a.VH_TYPE != '1' and a.VH_TYPE != '5' and a.VH_TYPE != '3' and a.VH_TYPE != '6'
a.VH_TYPE = #VH_TYPE#
a.EQ_ID = #EQ_ID#
a.VH_NAME like CONCAT('%',#VH_NAME#,'%')
a.VH_STAT = #VH_STAT#
a.VH_IP like CONCAT('%',#VH_IP#,'%')
a.VH_UUID not in
#uuidList[]#
a.domain =#domain#
group by a.vh_ip, a.id

SELECT a.ID, a.VH_UUID, a.VH_ID, a.VH_NAME, a.VH_MEM, a.VH_CPU, a.VH_STORAGE, a.VH_SYSTEM, IFNULL(a.VH_IP, '-') AS VH_IP, IFNULL(a.VH_NETWORK, '0') AS VH_NETWORK, a.EQ_ID, a.VH_STAT, a.VH_DESC, a.VH_MIN_CPU, a.VH_MAX_CPU, a.VH_MIN_MEM, a.VH_MAX_MEM, a.VH_LOG, a.VH_USER, a.VH_PASS, a.BUSI_STATUS, a.domain, CONCAT(CASE WHEN t2.type = 4 THEN CONCAT(t6.`name`,'_' ) ELSE '' END , t2.`name`) name, t4.`NAME` as NET_NAME, CASE WHEN a.vh_type = '1' THEN 'VMWARE' WHEN a.vh_type = '3' THEN 'XEN' END AS VH_TYPE, a.VH_CID, a.VH_STATUS, a.VH_UNITID, a.DNS, a.CONNECT_ID AS connectId, count(e.IP) AS APPNUM, e.ID AS H_ID, h.EQ_NAME AS EQ_NAME, t5.PROJECT_NAME FROM TB_CLOUD2_VMHOST_INFO a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT b.IP, b.ID FROM TB_BUSI_DEPLOY_EXAMPLE g, TB_BUSI_HOST b, TB_SYS_APP d, TB_CLOUD2_BIZSYS_INFO e, TB_BUSI_HOST_CONFIG f WHERE g.HOSTID = b.ID AND g.APPID = d.ID AND g.SYS_ID = e.SYS_ID AND g.HOST_CONFIG_ID = f.HOSTCONFIGID ) e ON a.VH_IP = e.IP LEFT JOIN TB_CLOUD2_HOST_INFO h ON a.eq_id = h.eq_id LEFT JOIN tb_busi_system_tree t1 ON t1.entity_id = a.VH_UUID AND t1.connect_id = a.CONNECT_ID LEFT JOIN tb_busi_system_tree t2 ON t1.parent_id = t2.id LEFT JOIN tb_busi_system_tree t6 ON t2.parent_id = t6.id LEFT JOIN ( select vm.vm_uuid,vm.connect_id,p.project_name from tb_project_vm_relation vm left join tb_project_info p on p.id = vm.project_id ) t5 on t5.vm_uuid = a.VH_UUID and t5.connect_id = a.CONNECT_ID LEFT JOIN TB_CLOUD2_IP_INFO t3 ON a.VH_IP=t3.IPADDRESS LEFT JOIN TB_CLOUD2_NET_INFO t4 ON t3.NET_ID=t4.NET_ID
EXISTS (select 1 from tb_host_global_info tt where tt.center_uuid = #centerid# and h.CONNECT_ID = tt.connect_uuid and tt.host_uuid = h.H_uuid)
a.VH_TYPE in ('1','3')
a.VH_TYPE != '1' and a.VH_TYPE != '5' and a.VH_TYPE != '3' and a.VH_TYPE != '6'
a.VH_TYPE = #VH_TYPE#
a.EQ_ID = #EQ_ID#
a.VH_UUID = #VH_UUID#
a.CONNECT_ID = #connectId#
a.VH_NAME like CONCAT('%',#VH_NAME#,'%')
a.VH_STAT = #VH_STAT#
a.VH_IP like CONCAT('%',#VH_IP#,'%')
a.VH_UUID not in
#uuidList[]#
t1.parent_id = #VH_CID#
a.domain =#domain#
group by a.vh_ip, a.id
sqlMap.select: order by VH_UPTIME DESC

select count(ID) from (
) virtual_table
sqlMap.sql:
select a.ID,a.VH_UUID,a.VH_ID,a.VH_NAME,a.VH_MEM,a.VH_CPU,a.VH_STORAGE,a.VH_SYSTEM,IFNULL(a.VH_IP,'-') AS VH_IP, a.VH_NETWORK,a.EQ_ID,a.VH_STAT,a.VH_DESC,a.VH_MIN_CPU,a.VH_MAX_CPU,a.VH_MIN_MEM,a.VH_MAX_MEM, a.VH_LOG,a.VH_USER,a.VH_PASS,a.BUSI_STATUS,CASE when a.vh_type='1' THEN 'VMWARE' WHEN a.vh_type ='3' THEN 'XEN' END AS VH_TYPE, a.VH_CID,a.VH_STATUS,a.VH_UNITID,a.VH_UPTIME,a.DNS,a.CONNECT_ID AS connectId,count(e.IP) as APPNUM, e.ID as H_ID,h.EQ_NAME as EQ_NAME,a.CONNECT_ID connectId, a.domain from TB_CLOUD2_VMHOST_INFO a left join (select b.IP, b.ID from TB_BUSI_DEPLOY_EXAMPLE g, TB_BUSI_HOST b, TB_SYS_APP d, TB_CLOUD2_BIZSYS_INFO e, TB_BUSI_HOST_CONFIG f WHERE g.HOSTID = b.ID AND g.APPID = d.ID AND g.SYS_ID = e.SYS_ID AND g.HOST_CONFIG_ID = f.HOSTCONFIGID) e ON a.VH_IP =e.IP LEFT JOIN TB_CLOUD2_HOST_INFO h on a.eq_id = h.eq_id
a.VH_TYPE in ('1','3')
a.VH_TYPE = #VH_TYPE#
a.EQ_ID = #EQ_ID#
a.VH_NAME like CONCAT('%',#VH_NAME#,'%')
a.VH_STAT = #VH_STAT#
a.VH_IP = #VH_IP#
exists (select * from tb_cloud_entityuser b where a.VH_UUID = b.entity_id and a.connect_id = b.connect_id and b.USERID=#USER_ID#)
a.domain =#domain#
group by a.vh_ip, a.id

select a.ID,a.VH_UUID,a.VH_ID,a.VH_NAME,a.VH_MEM,a.VH_CPU,a.VH_STORAGE,a.VH_SYSTEM,IFNULL(a.VH_IP,'-') AS VH_IP, a.VH_NETWORK,a.EQ_ID,a.VH_STAT,a.VH_DESC,a.VH_MIN_CPU,a.VH_MAX_CPU,a.VH_MIN_MEM,a.VH_MAX_MEM, a.VH_LOG,a.VH_USER,a.VH_PASS,a.BUSI_STATUS, CONCAT(CASE WHEN t2.type = 4 THEN CONCAT(t6.`name`,'_' ) ELSE '' END , t2.`name`) name,t4.`NAME` as NET_NAME, CASE when a.vh_type='1' THEN 'VMWARE' WHEN a.vh_type ='3' THEN 'XEN' END AS VH_TYPE, a.VH_CID,a.VH_STATUS,a.VH_UNITID,a.VH_UPTIME,a.DNS,a.CONNECT_ID AS connectId,count(e.IP) as APPNUM, e.ID as H_ID,h.EQ_NAME as EQ_NAME, t5.PROJECT_NAME,a.domain from TB_CLOUD2_VMHOST_INFO a left join (select b.IP, b.ID from TB_BUSI_DEPLOY_EXAMPLE g, TB_BUSI_HOST b, TB_SYS_APP d, TB_CLOUD2_BIZSYS_INFO e, TB_BUSI_HOST_CONFIG f WHERE g.HOSTID = b.ID AND g.APPID = d.ID AND g.SYS_ID = e.SYS_ID AND g.HOST_CONFIG_ID = f.HOSTCONFIGID) e ON a.VH_IP =e.IP LEFT JOIN TB_CLOUD2_HOST_INFO h on a.eq_id = h.eq_id LEFT JOIN tb_busi_system_tree t1 ON t1.entity_id = a.VH_UUID AND t1.connect_id = a.CONNECT_ID LEFT JOIN tb_busi_system_tree t2 ON t1.parent_id = t2.id LEFT JOIN tb_busi_system_tree t6 ON t2.parent_id = t6.id LEFT JOIN TB_CLOUD2_IP_INFO t3 ON a.VH_IP=t3.IPADDRESS LEFT JOIN TB_CLOUD2_NET_INFO t4 ON t3.NET_ID=t4.NET_ID LEFT JOIN ( select vm.vm_uuid,vm.connect_id,p.project_name from tb_project_vm_relation vm left join tb_project_info p on p.id = vm.project_id ) t5 on t5.vm_uuid = a.VH_UUID and t5.connect_id = a.CONNECT_ID
EXISTS (select 1 from tb_host_global_info tt where tt.center_uuid = #centerid# and h.CONNECT_ID = tt.connect_uuid and tt.host_uuid = h.H_uuid)
a.VH_TYPE in ('1','3')
a.VH_TYPE = #VH_TYPE#
a.EQ_ID = #EQ_ID#
a.VH_NAME like CONCAT('%',#VH_NAME#,'%')
a.VH_UUID = #VH_UUID#
a.CONNECT_ID = #connectId#
a.VH_STAT = #VH_STAT#
a.VH_IP like CONCAT('%',#VH_IP#,'%')
exists (select * from tb_cloud_entityuser b where a.VH_UUID = b.entity_id and a.connect_id = b.connect_id and b.USERID=#USER_ID#)
a.VH_UUID not in
#uuidList[]#
t1.parent_id = #VH_CID#
a.domain =#domain#
group by a.vh_ip, a.id
sqlMap.select: order by VH_UPTIME desc

select count(ID) from (
) virtual_table
sqlMap.update: update TB_CLOUD2_VMHOST_INFO set VH_NAME=#VH_NAME# where VH_ID=#VH_ID#

update TB_CLOUD2_VMHOST_INFO set VH_CPU= #VH_CPU#,VH_MEM = #VH_MEM#, VH_STORAGE = #VH_STORAGE#
ID = #ID#
VH_UUID = #VH_UUID#

update TB_CLOUD2_VMHOST_INFO set DNS= #DNS#,VH_CPU = #VH_CPU#, VH_IP = #VH_IP# , VH_MEM = #VH_MEM#, VH_NAME = #VH_NAME#, VH_STAT = #VH_STAT#, VH_SYSTEM = #VH_SYSTEM# , VH_TYPE = #VH_TYPE# where VH_UUID = #VH_UUID# and VH_TYPE = #VH_TYPE#
update TB_CLOUD2_VMHOST_INFO set VH_STAT = #VH_STAT# where VH_UUID = #VH_UUID#
sqlMap.delete:
delete from TB_CLOUD2_VMHOST_INFO
ID = #ID#
VH_UUID = #VH_UUID#
VH_TYPE = #VH_TYPE#
CONNECT_ID = #connectId#
sqlMap.select:
select count(t.VH_TYPE) num, sum(t.VH_CPU) cpu, sum(t.VH_MEM) mem , sum(t.VH_STORAGE) storage from TB_CLOUD2_VMHOST_INFO t
t.domain =#domain#
group by t.vh_type
select * from TB_CLOUD2_VM_RELATION t where t.VM_UUID =#vm_uuid# and t.USER_NAME = #user_name#
sqlMap.update: update TB_CLOUD2_VMHOST_INFO set EQ_ID=#EQ_ID# where VH_UUID=#VH_UUID#
sqlMap.delete: delete from TB_CLOUD2_VM_RELATION where VM_UUID = #vm_uuid# and USER_NAME = #user_name#
sqlMap.update: update TB_CLOUD2_VMHOST_INFO set VH_NAME= #VH_NAME#,VH_CPU = #VH_CPU#, VH_MEM = #VH_MEM#, VH_STORAGE=#VH_STORAGE#, VH_SYSTEM = #VH_SYSTEM#,EQ_ID=#EQ_ID#,VH_IP = #VH_IP#, VH_STAT = #VH_STAT#, VH_TYPE = #VH_TYPE#,VH_NETWORK=#VH_NETWORK# where VH_UUID = #VH_UUID#
update TB_CLOUD2_VMHOST_INFO set VH_TYPE = #VH_TYPE# where VH_UUID = #VH_UUID#

update TB_CLOUD2_VMHOST_INFO
VH_NAME= #VH_NAME#
VH_CPU = #VH_CPU#
VH_MEM = #VH_MEM#
VH_SYSTEM = #VH_SYSTEM#
VH_STORAGE=#VH_STORAGE#
EQ_ID=#EQ_ID#
VH_IP = #VH_IP#
VH_STAT = #VH_STAT#
DNS=#DNS#
HOST_CODE=#hostCode#
UPDATE_TIME=#updateTime#
CONNECT_STATUS=#connectStatus#
VH_UNITID= #VH_UNITID#
VH_LOG= #VH_LOG#
VH_UUID = #VH_UUID#
CONNECT_ID=#connectId#
sqlMap.select:
select HOST_CODE from tb_cloud2_vmhost_info where VH_UUID in
#uuidlist[]#
CONNECT_ID = #connectId#
domain =#domain#
sqlMap.sql: VH_ID,VH_NAME,VH_MEM,VH_CPU,VH_STORAGE,VH_SYSTEM,VH_IP,VH_NETWORK, DATE_FORMAT(VH_RUNTIME,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') VH_RUNTIME, VH_STAT,VH_DESC,PROJECT_ID,EQ_ID,VH_MIN_CPU,VH_MAX_CPU,VH_MIN_MEM,VH_MAX_MEM, DATE_FORMAT(VH_STARTED,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') VH_STARTED, DATE_FORMAT(VH_COMPLETED,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') VH_COMPLETED, DATE_FORMAT(VH_DEPLOYETIME,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') VH_DEPLOYETIME, DATE_FORMAT(VH_UPTIME,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') VH_UPTIME, VH_LOG,VH_USER,VH_PASS,VH_PROCESS_UNIT,VH_MAX_PROCESS_UNIT,VH_MIN_PROCESS_UNIT,VH_CPU_MODE,VH_PROCESS_UNIT_MODE,VH_ID_IBM, VH_NULL,PROTOCOL,VH_TYPE,VH_STATUS,VH_CID,VH_UNITID,VH_UUID,ID,TEMPLET_TYPE,DNS,CONNECT_ID connectId,HOST_CODE hostCode
sqlMap.select:
select
from tb_cloud2_vmhost_info where VH_UUID in
#uuidList[]#
VH_TYPE = #VH_TYPE#
VH_STAT = #VH_STAT#
CONNECT_STATUS = #connectStatus#
CONNECT_ID = #connectId#
domain =#domain#
sqlMap.update: update tb_cloud2_vmhost_info set EQ_ID = #EQ_ID#,HOST_CODE = #hostCode# where CONNECT_ID=#connectId# and VH_UUID = #VH_UUID#
sqlMap.select:
select
from tb_cloud2_vmhost_info where VH_UUID in
#uuidList[]#
VH_TYPE = #VH_TYPE#
CONNECT_ID = #connectId#
domain =#domain#
and ( ( CONNECT_STATUS
<> 'connected'
or CONNECT_STATUS is null ) or ( CONNECT_STATUS = 'connected' and VH_STAT not in (0,1) ) or ( CONNECT_STATUS = 'connected' and VH_STAT is null ) )

select t.VH_NAME,t.VH_IP,t.VH_TYPE,t.VH_SYSTEM,t.VH_CPU,t.VH_MEM,t.VH_STAT,t.CONNECT_STATUS from tb_cloud2_vmhost_info t inner join tb_virtual_global_info g on t.vh_uuid = g.vm_uuid and t.connect_id = g.connect_uuid
where ( (t.CONNECT_STATUS
<> 'connected'
or t.CONNECT_STATUS is null ) or( t.CONNECT_STATUS = 'connected' and t.VH_STAT not in (0,1) ) or ( CONNECT_STATUS = 'connected' and VH_STAT is null ) )
t.VH_TYPE = #VH_TYPE#
CONCAT_WS('_',g.cluster_uuid,g.connect_uuid) in
#clusterList[]#
CONCAT_WS('_',g.host_uuid,g.connect_uuid) in
#uuidList[]#
domain =#domain#

select t.VH_NAME,t.VH_IP,t.VH_TYPE,t.VH_SYSTEM,t.VH_CPU,t.VH_STORAGE,t.VH_MEM,t.VH_STAT,t.CONNECT_STATUS connectStatus from tb_cloud2_vmhost_info t inner join tb_virtual_global_info g on t.vh_uuid = g.vm_uuid and t.connect_id = g.connect_uuid
t.VH_TYPE = #VH_TYPE#
t.VH_STATUS = #VH_STATUS#
t.VH_STAT = #VH_STAT#
CONCAT_WS('_',g.cluster_uuid,g.connect_uuid) in
#clusterList[]#
CONCAT_WS('_',g.host_uuid,g.connect_uuid) in
#uuidList[]#
domain =#domain#

select count(vh_uuid) from tb_cloud2_vmhost_info t inner join tb_virtual_global_info g on t.vh_uuid = g.vm_uuid
where ( (t.CONNECT_STATUS
<> 'connected'
or t.CONNECT_STATUS is null ) or( t.CONNECT_STATUS = 'connected' and t.VH_STAT not in (0,1) ) or ( CONNECT_STATUS = 'connected' and VH_STAT is null ) )
t.VH_TYPE = #VH_TYPE#
CONCAT_WS('_',g.cluster_uuid,g.connect_uuid) in
#clusterList[]#
CONCAT_WS('_',g.host_uuid,g.connect_uuid) in
#uuidList[]#
domain =#domain#

select count(t.VH_NAME) from tb_cloud2_vmhost_info t inner join tb_virtual_global_info g on t.vh_uuid = g.vm_uuid and t.connect_id = g.connect_uuid
t.VH_TYPE = #VH_TYPE#
t.VH_STATUS = #VH_STATUS#
t.VH_STAT = #VH_STAT#
CONCAT_WS('_',g.cluster_uuid,g.connect_uuid) in
#clusterList[]#
CONCAT_WS('_',g.host_uuid,g.connect_uuid) in
#uuidList[]#
domain =#domain#

select t.VH_NAME,t.VH_UUID,t.CONNECT_ID connectId,t.VH_CPU,t.VH_MEM,t.VH_STORAGE,t.VH_SYSTEM,t.VH_IP,h.eq_name EQ_NAME from tb_cloud2_vmhost_info t left join tb_project_vm_relation a on t.vh_uuid = a.vm_uuid and t.connect_id = a.connect_id left join tb_cloud2_host_info h on t.EQ_ID = h.EQ_ID where a.project_id = #PROJECT_ID#
t.VH_NAME like CONCAT('%',#VH_NAME#,'%')
t.domain =#domain#

SELECT a.VH_NAME, a.VH_UUID, a.CONNECT_ID connectId, a.VH_CPU, a.VH_MEM, a.VH_STORAGE, a.VH_SYSTEM, a.VH_IP, c.eq_name EQ_NAME FROM tb_cloud2_vmhost_info a LEFT JOIN tb_cloud2_host_info c ON a.EQ_ID = c.EQ_ID WHERE CONCAT_WS('_', a.CONNECT_ID, a.VH_UUID) NOT IN ( SELECT d.ENTITY_ID FROM tb_workorder_resource d LEFT JOIN tb_cloud2_workorder_info e ON d.workorder_id = e.uuid WHERE e.type = #workOrderType# and e.state = 0 AND d.STATUS IN (0,1,2) )
a.VH_NAME like CONCAT('%',#VH_NAME#,'%')
a.domain =#domain#

select count(t.vh_uuid) from tb_cloud2_vmhost_info t left join tb_project_vm_relation a on t.vh_uuid = a.vm_uuid and t.connect_id = a.connect_id where a.project_id = #PROJECT_ID#
t.domain =#domain#

SELECT COUNT(a.VH_UUID) FROM tb_cloud2_vmhost_info a LEFT JOIN tb_cloud2_host_info c ON a.EQ_ID = c.EQ_ID WHERE CONCAT_WS('_', a.CONNECT_ID, a.VH_UUID) NOT IN ( SELECT d.ENTITY_ID FROM tb_workorder_resource d LEFT JOIN tb_cloud2_workorder_info e ON d.workorder_id = e.uuid WHERE e.type = 2 and e.state = 0 and d.STATUS IN (0,1,2) )
a.VH_NAME like CONCAT('%',#VH_NAME#,'%')
a.CONNECT_ID in
#connectCodeList[]#
a.domain =#domain#
sqlMap.sql:
select a.ID,a.VH_UUID, a.VH_ID,a.VH_NAME,a.VH_MEM,a.VH_CPU,a.VH_STORAGE,a.VH_SYSTEM,a.VH_IP,IFNULL(a.VH_NETWORK, '0') AS VH_NETWORK,a.EQ_ID,a.VH_STAT,a.VH_DESC,a.VH_MIN_CPU, a.VH_MAX_CPU,a.VH_MIN_MEM,a.VH_MAX_MEM,a.VH_LOG,a.VH_USER,a.VH_PASS,a.VH_TYPE, a.VH_CID,a.VH_STATUS,a.VH_UNITID,a.DNS,a.CONNECT_ID connectId,a.HOST_CODE hostCode from TB_CLOUD2_VMHOST_INFO a
a.VH_NAME like CONCAT('%',#VH_NAME#,'%')
a.VH_TYPE = #VH_TYPE#
a.VH_TYPE = #VH_TYPE_1#
a.ID = #ID#
a.VH_UUID = #VH_UUID#
a.VH_IP = #VH_IP#
a.CONNECT_ID = #connectId#
a.domain =#domain#
sqlMap.select: order by VH_UPTIME DESC

select count(ID) from (
) virtual_table

select t.vh_name,t.vh_uuid,t.vh_storage,t.vh_cpu,t.vh_mem,c.NET_ID VH_NETWORK,t.VH_IP,a.temCode temid from tb_cloud2_vmhost_info t inner JOIN tb_vm_tem_relation a on t.vh_uuid = a.vmCode and t.CONNECT_ID = a.connectCode LEFT JOIN tb_cloud2_ip_info c on t.VH_IP = c.IPADDRESS and t.CONNECT_ID = #connectId# and t.VH_UUID = #VH_UUID#;

SELECT t.VH_NAME, t.VH_UUID, t.CONNECT_ID connectId FROM tb_cloud2_vmhost_info t
t.VH_UUID = #VH_UUID#
t.CONNECT_ID = #connectId#
t.domain =#domain#
sqlMap.insert: insert into tb_cloud2_vmhost_info (ID, VH_ID, VH_NAME, VH_MEM, VH_CPU, VH_SYSTEM, EQ_ID, VH_PROCESS_UNIT, VH_CPU_MODE, VH_TYPE, VH_UUID, HOST_CODE, INSERT_TIME, UPDATE_TIME) select #ID#, #VH_ID#, t.lpar_name, t.memory_size, t.desired_procs, t.lpar_env, #EQ_ID#, t.desired_proc_units, t.curr_proc_mode, #VH_TYPE#, concat(t.machineserialnumber, '_',t.lpar_id), t.machineserialnumber, sysdate, sysdate from SX_LOGICAL_PARTITION t where concat(t.machineserialnumber, '_',t.lpar_id)=#VH_UUID#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE tb_cloud2_vmhost_info cvi INNER JOIN SX_LOGICAL_PARTITION lp ON cvi.VH_UUID = concat(lp.machineserialnumber, '_',lp.lpar_id) AND cvi.VH_TYPE = #VH_TYPE# AND cvi.VH_UUID = #VH_UUID# SET cvi.VH_NAME = lp.lpar_name, cvi.VH_MEM = lp.memory_size, cvi.VH_CPU = lp.DESIRED_PROCS, cvi.VH_SYSTEM = lp.LPAR_ENV, cvi.EQ_ID = #EQ_ID#, cvi.VH_PROCESS_UNIT = lp.desired_proc_units, cvi.VH_CPU_MODE = lp.curr_proc_mode, cvi.VH_UUID = concat(lp.machineserialnumber, '_',lp.lpar_id), cvi.HOST_CODE = lp.machineserialnumber, cvi.UPDATE_TIME = NOW()
sqlMap.sql:
SELECT f.CONNECT_ID connectId, f.VH_UUID, f.VH_CPU, f.VH_MEM, f.VH_STORAGE, f.VH_SYSTEM, f.VH_STAT, f.VH_DESC, f.VH_NAME, f.VH_IP, f.VH_TYPE, d.ipaddress public_ip, f.USERID USER_ID FROM ( SELECT e.CONNECT_ID, e.VH_UUID, e.VH_CPU, e.VH_MEM, e.VH_STORAGE, e.VH_SYSTEM, e.VH_STAT, e.VH_DESC, e.VH_NAME, e.VH_IP, e.VH_TYPE, d.USERID FROM tb_cloud2_vmhost_info e LEFT JOIN tb_cloud_entityuser d ON e.CONNECT_ID = d.CONNECT_ID AND e.VH_UUID = d.ENTITY_ID ) f LEFT JOIN ( SELECT a.connectid, a.vm_uuid, a.ip, a.ip_type, b.ipaddress, b.region_id, b.user_id FROM tb_cloud2_vm_ip_relation a LEFT JOIN tb_public_ip b ON a.vm_uuid = b.entity_id AND a.connectid = b.connect_id ) d ON f.CONNECT_ID = d.connectid AND f.VH_UUID = d.vm_uuid
f.VH_UUID=#VH_UUID#
f.CONNECT_ID=#connectId#
f.CONNECT_ID in
#connectCodeList[]#
f.domain =#domain#
f.VH_NAME like CONCAT('%',#VH_NAME#,'%')
f.USERID=#USER_ID#
sqlMap.select:
select count(VH_UUID) from (
) virtual_table
sqlMap.update: update tb_cloud2_vmhost_info set VH_DESC=#VH_DESC# where CONNECT_ID=#connectId# and VH_UUID=#VH_UUID#
